content:
Dear colleagues,

I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude and say goodbye as I leave my position at the company. It has been a pleasure working with all of you, and I have truly enjoyed the occasional opportunities I had to collaborate with you from abroad.

I have learned so much from each and every one of you, and I will always be grateful for the knowledge, support, and friendship you have provided me. Your professionalism, expertise, and dedication to our work has been an inspiration to me, and I have no doubt that you will continue to excel in all that you do.

I will always look back on my time here with fond memories and a sense of accomplishment. I am so grateful to have had the opportunity to be a part of this team, and I will miss you all greatly.

Please do not hesitate to reach out to me in the future, as I would love to stay in touch and continue to work together in any way I can.

Thank you again for everything, and all the best to each and every one of you.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
